Wardrobe, Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Satellite, Cable-TV, Security, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 1 bedroom newly renovated apartment is available for rent at Dirsi residential area. The apartment is equipped with new furniture, home appliances, etc.
Dirsi residential area includes:
-	Security (for the area as well as for the building)
-	Recreation areas/infrastructure (stadiums, tennis courts, boulevard, road for cycling, parking)
The apartment is equipped with:
-	Washing machine
-	Fridge (Sumsung)
-	TV (LG 42in LED)
-	Central heating
-	Thermal insulation
-	Other necessary items
In case of interest or any additional questions please contact me via E-mail: gmikhelidze@gmail.
